programme.title: Carter cuts aid deals
programme.short_synopsis: President Carter ends aid deals over human rights abuses.
programme.medium_synopsis: Russian reaction to Carter meeting dissident. President cuts aid over human rights abuses.
programme.long_synopsis:
Russian reaction to Carter meeting dissident. President cuts aid over human rights abuses.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
